creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture; formerly given to the Center by Carol Brooks
description: snowy landscape: snow-covered house on stilts among a few pines and rocks at L; three snow-covered mountains in background; two figures in boat lower center; waterfall UL; distant boats in bay at UR
marks: Signature, Seals, and Stickers LLC: [yuku-toshi rokujissai Tan\'yuu hoogan hitsu]
title: Wang Ziyou Visiting Dai Andao on a Snowy Evening
